author: scoobytoobins
post_text: September 11, 2018 at 4:21 PM#1Hey all,Trying to create a macro to select the cue before my Cue 100 (Scene cue which offs all pages besides the scene page) on each executor. Is this possible?Was trying to create a variable for cue '100 - 1' but because the cue before it may be cue 25 on Executor 1 and cue 39 on Executor 2 it's not seeming to make much sense.Any ideas?

posts.author: scoobytoobins
posts.post_text: September 11, 2018 at 4:21 PM#1Hey all,Trying to create a macro to select the cue before my Cue 100 (Scene cue which offs all pages besides the scene page) on each executor. Is this possible?Was trying to create a variable for cue '100 - 1' but because the cue before it may be cue 25 on Executor 1 and cue 39 on Executor 2 it's not seeming to make much sense.Any ideas?

posts.author: glad
posts.post_text: September 11, 2018 at 5:29 PM#2what do you mean with "selecting" a cue?

posts.author: gralf
posts.post_text: September 11, 2018 at 5:33 PM#3What about:Codecue 100 thru 0.001 - 100 pleaseGralf

posts.author: scoobytoobins
posts.post_text: September 11, 2018 at 8:32 PM#4Sorry, I meant basically "Go cue one before cue 100"Go Cue 100 thru .001 - 100 works!Thanks Gralf

title: Cue 100 - 1 Macro
